          <title>
            <string language="fr">Trois types de rayonnement</string>
            <string language="en">Three Types of Radiation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drei Typen Strahlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Três tipos de radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tre tipi di radiazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρεις τύποι ακτινοβολιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tres tipos de radiación</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Rayonnement alpha, bêta et gamma : Trois  types de rayonnement. Animation montrant que différentes sources radioactives produisent différents types de rayonnement.</string>
            <string language="en">Alpha, beta and gamma radiation: Three types of radiation. Animation showing that different radioactive sources produce different types of radiation.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alpha-, Beta- und gammastrahlung: Drei 
Typen Strahlung. Animationvertretung, daß unterschiedliche 
radioaktive Quellen unterschiedliche Typen der Strahlung produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação do alfa, a beta e a gamma: Três
tipos de radiação. Exibição do animation que as fontes 
radioativas diferentes produzem tipos diferentes de radiação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Beta e radiazione gamma dell'alfa,: Tre 
tipi di radiazioni. Rappresentazione di animazione che le 
sorgenti radioattive differenti producono i tipi differenti di 
radiazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλφα, βήτα και ακτινοβολία γάμμα: Τρεις τύποι 
ακτινοβολιών. Ζωτικότητα που δείχνει ότι οι διαφορετικές 
ραδιενεργές πηγές παράγουν τους διαφορετικούς τύπους 
ακτινοβολιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación de la alfa, beta y gamma: Tres 
tipos de radiación. Demostración de la animación que diversas
fuentes radiactivas producen diversos tipos de radiación.</string>
          </description>
